WorkItem.Description:
PHPExcel already supports datavalidation in the Excel2007 reader and writer.
Â 
We would like similar support for .xls files in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5.
WorkItem.Summary: Data validation support in PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 and PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message: Support for Excel5 and data validation would be greatly appreciated.  I am also in need of this.
Is it planned to added in the new PHPExcel version

Yes, me too. May be I can help to develop this feature together with PHPExcel Team? I need this feature NOW, or as soon as possible.
I will create a discussion for this topic. I do not want be insolent, but my advanced xls documents are not 100% working without comboboxes and my customer a realy furiously...

Data validation support in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
>> Data validation support in PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 and PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

For a start, support for PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 should be available from tomorrow.

Implemented in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 in source code tomorrow:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets

Fixing a couple of bugs related to list type data validation per post:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=80422#Post284460

Fixing another bug related to list type data validation per post:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=73404#Post413237

Using patch: wi-10300-2.patch
It won't work in Excel 5 please contact me how to fix it
